name: Item List DFM
query:
Select
item.creation as 'Created On',
item.modified as 'Last Modified on',
item.lead_time_days as 'Lead Time in days',
item.safety_stock as 'Safety Stock',
item.category as "Category",
item.item_group as "Group",
id.default_warehouse as "Store",
item.item_name as "Item Name",
item.name_in_tally as "Name In Tally",
item.name as "Item Code",
item.stock_uom as "Base Unit",
uom.conversion_factor as "Conversion",
item.customs_tariff_number as "Tariff Number",
item.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group",
item.product_line as "Product Line",
item.product_category as "Product Category",
item.price_category as "Price Category",
item.product_variant as "Product Variant",
item.promo_code as "Promo Code"

from `tabItem` item ,`tabItem Default` id ,`tabUOM Conversion Detail` uom
Where id.parent=item.name and 
uom.parent=item.name;
